DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety GW856553 COPD patient assess affect COPD disease 14 day .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate The Effects Of GW856553 On Patients With COPD ( Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Women childbearing potential Established history COPD Cigarette smoke history great 10 pack year FEV1 40 80 % predict normal height , age sex . Exclusion criterion : Morbidly obese patient ( body mass index > 40 ) Hospitalisation treatment worsen COPD past 6 week History increase liver function test hypersensitivity salbutamol ipratropium bromide Blood pressure > 155/95
